root.name: substring()

example.code: str1 = "CCCP" str2 = "Rabbit" ss1 = str1.substring(2)# Returns "CP" ss2 = str2.substring(3)# Returns "bit" ss3 = str1.substring(0, 2)# Returns "CC" println(ss1 + ":" + ss2 + ":" + ss3)# Prints "CP:bit:CC"

root.description: Returns a new string that is a part of the original string. When using the endIndex parameter, the string between beginIndex and endIndex-1 is returned.

parameter.label: str
parameter.description: String: any variable of type String

parameter.label: beginIndex
parameter.description: int: position from which to begin (inclusive)

parameter.label: endIndex
parameter.description: int: position from which to end (exclusive)
